item.title: [OpenUI5] set required field in form element
item.description: 对FormElement中的sap.m.Input设置了required属性，但是界面上的标签并没有显示星号*。 new FormElement({ label: "name", fields: [ new sap.m.Input({ id: sFormId+"-name", type: sap.m.InputType.Text, value: "{/name}", required: true, layoutData: new GridData({span: "L3 M5 S6"}) }) ] }) 通过阅读Q: UI5 Setting field as required得知，需要对label属性赋值一个带有required为true的Label控件。 new FormElement({ label: new sap.m.Label({ text:"name", required:true }), fields: [ new sap.m.Input({ id: sFormId+"-name", type: sap.m.InputType.Text, value: "{/name}", required: true, layoutData: new GridData({span: "L3 M5 S6"}) }) ] })
